Public Class GridView Inherits ViewBase Implements IAddChild

type GridView = class inherit ViewBase interface IAddChild

summary.span: 表示 控件的以列形式显示数据项的视图模式。

span.span: Represents a view mode that displays data items in columns for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类及其支持类提供基础结构，用于显示在一系列列中为 控件指定的数据项。The class and its supporting classes provide the infrastructure to display data items that are specified for a control in a series of columns. 列具有列标题，列标题是派生自 的按钮，你可以通过使用拖放操作对列进行重新排序。The columns have column headers, which are buttons that are derived from , and you can reorder the columns by using drag-and-drop operations. 请注意， 的列显示数据，而不提供对数据源的直接访问。Note that the columns of a display data and do not provide direct access to the source of the data. 若要将 指定为 的视图模式，请将 属性设置为 对象。To specify a as the view mode for a , set the property to a object. 类派生自 。The class is derived from . 可以通过从提供视图支持元素的 类继承来定义自定义视图。You can define custom views by inheriting from the class that provides the supporting elements for a view. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：为 ListView 创建自定义视图模式](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-a-custom-view-mode-for-a-listview)。For more information, see [How to: Create a Custom View Mode for a ListView](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-a-custom-view-mode-for-a-listview). 下图显示了使用 的 的示例。The following illustration shows an example of a that uses a . ![带有 GridView 输出的 ListView](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "具有 GridView 输出的 ListView")![ListView with GridView output](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView with GridView output") 中的列定义为 对象。The columns in a are defined as objects. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]中，你可以将 对象定义为 的子元素。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], you can define objects as child elements of the . 在代码中，可以使用 属性和为 类定义的 方法，将 添加到 中。In code, you can add a to the by using the property and the method that is defined for the class. 同样，您还可以使用其他 方法，例如 和 来修改 中的列。Similarly, you can use other methods such as and to modify the columns in a . 下面的示例演示如何定义 的列。The following example shows how to define the columns of a . [!code-csharp[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumn)] [!code-vb[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumn)] [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumn)] 若要为 中的行提供样式，请在 中定义 控件的样式。To style the rows in a , define a style for the controls in the . 若要将 或 控件等可视元素添加到 ，请使用模板或样式。To add visual elements, such as a or control, to a , use templates or styles. 有关示例，请参阅[如何：使用复选框创建 listviewitem](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-listviewitems-with-a-checkbox)。For an example, see [How to: Create ListViewItems with a CheckBox](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-listviewitems-with-a-checkbox). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义一个将 作为其 实现的 控件。The following example shows how to define a control that implements a as its . [!code-xaml[ListViewSnips#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要应用于列标题的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style to apply to column headers.

value.span: 用于定义列标题的显示属性的 。

span.span: The that is used to define the display properties for column headers.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和 属性都用于为表示 中的列标题的 对象定义可视化树。The property and the property are both used to define the visual tree for the objects that represent the column headers in a . 如果未通过为 对象定义 来指定 ，则 属性还可以定义列标题内容。The property can also define column header content when a is not by specified by defining a for the object. 此属性表示对列标题进行布局和样式的多种方式之一。This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview). 设置样式时，有一些限制。When you set styles, there are some restrictions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式设置和模板化](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating). ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values `ResourceExtension` 以下项之一： `StaticResource`或 `DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). `StyleResourceKey` 标识所请求的样式的键。The key that identifies the style being requested. 该键引用 中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法在技术上是可行的，但不建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅[内联样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates). 使用[TemplateBinding](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension)或的绑定引用也可能发生，但情况并不常见。A binding reference using [TemplateBinding](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension) or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义 属性。The following example shows how to define the property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个撰写字符串，该字符串指定如果 的列标题显示为字符串，应如何设置这些列标题的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the if they are displayed as strings.

value.span: 一个撰写字符串，指定如果 的列标题显示为字符串，应如何设置这些列标题的格式。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the if they are displayed as strings.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已设置 、或 属性，则忽略此属性。If the , , or property is set, this property is ignored. 您可以使用多个属性来指定列标题的格式。You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers. 如果设置了多个属性，则将列标题的格式设置为具有最高优先级的属性的值。If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority. 可以在多种类型上设置列的格式。The format for a column can be set on several types. 以下列表显示了可用于设置列标题格式的属性，按从低到高的优先级按顺序排列：The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - - - ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示列标题的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets a template to use to display the column headers.

value.span: 用于将列标题作为 的一部分来显示的 。

span.span: The to use to display the column headers as part of the .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果同时设置了 属性和 属性， 属性将优先。If the property and the property are both set, the property takes precedence. 此属性表示对列标题进行布局和样式的多种方式之一。This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview). ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `ResourceExtension` 以下项之一： `StaticResource`或 `DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). `TemplateResourceKey` 标识所请求的模板的键。The key that identifies the template being requested. 该键引用 中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法在技术上是可行的，但不建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅[内联样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates). 使用[TemplateBinding](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension)或的绑定引用也可能发生，但情况并不常见。A binding reference using [TemplateBinding](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension) or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::DataTemplateSelector ^ ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector { System::Windows::Controls::DataTemplateSelector ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::DataTemplateSelector ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为选择每个列标题所使用的模板提供逻辑的选择器对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the selector object that provides logic for selecting a template to use for each column header.

value.span: 一个 对象，确定每个列标题要使用的数据模板。

span.span: The object that determines the data template to use for each column header.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未设置此属性，则默认逻辑是使用所有列的 属性（如果已定义）。If you do not set this property, the default logic is to use the property for all columns if it is defined. 如果同时设置了 属性和 属性， 属性将优先。If the property and the property are both set, the property takes precedence. 此属性表示对列标题进行布局和样式的多种方式之一。This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview). ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `ResourceExtension` 以下项之一： `StaticResource`或 `DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). `DataTemplateSelectorClassKey` 标识所请求的选择器实现的键。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 该键引用实现实际 重写的派生类。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml). 还可以以编程方式将 类的实例作为资源添加到应用程序资源字典。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to the application resource dictionary. `MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation` 一个派生自 的类，该类实现实际的 重写。A class derived from that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置当鼠标指针悬停在某个列标题上时显示的工具提示的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of a tooltip that appears when the mouse pointer pauses over one of the column headers.

value.span: 一个对象，表示当鼠标指针悬停在某个列标题上时显示的工具提示的内容。

span.span: An object that represents the content that appears as a tooltip when the mouse pointer is paused over one of the column headers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示对列标题进行布局和样式的多种方式之一。This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview). ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `toolTipContent` 一个字符串，该字符串将成为 的显示文本。A string that becomes the display text for the . `toolTipObjectContent` 要用作工具提示的内容的对象。An object to use as the content for the tooltip. 通常，此对象是一个 或一些其他元素，用于定义 的布局，如文本元素。Typically, this object is a or some other element that defines a layout for the , such as a text element. 在此用法中，将从分析的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中隐式创建一个 元素，`toolTipObjectContent` 内容将设置为其 属性。In this usage, a element is implicitly created from the parsed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], and the `toolTipObjectContent` content is set as its property. <`ToolTip` .../><`ToolTip` .../> 请参阅 。See . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#GridViewAllowsColumnReorderPart1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewallowscolumnreorderpart1)] [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#GridViewAllowsColumnReorderPart2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewallowscolumnreorderpart2)] [!code-csharp[ListViewCode#GridViewAllowsColumnReorder](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewallowscolumnreorder)] [!code-vb[ListViewCode#GridViewAllowsColumnReorder](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewallowscolumnreorder)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 中使用此只读静态属性，方法是将其静态值分配给另一个属性值。You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value. 具体而言，此属性的静态值定义了用于查找 的默认 样式的资源键。Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default style of a . 若要重新定义此样式，请使用[X:Static 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension)来引用 ，并将该值指定为新 的[x：Key 指令](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive)。To redefine this style, reference the by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive) of the new .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 中使用此只读静态属性，方法是将其静态值分配给另一个属性值。You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value. 具体而言，此属性的静态值定义用于查找默认 样式的资源键。Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default style. 若要重新定义此样式，请使用[X:Static 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension)来引用 ，并将该值指定为新 的[x：Key 指令](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive)。To redefine this style, reference the by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive) of the new . 可以在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 中使用此只读属性作为 的 " [x：Key" 指令](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive)，该指令重新定义 的 。You can use this read-only property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] as an [x:Key Directive](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive) of a that redefines the for the .
